outputs.output_descr: LAC COs receive technical assistance to support national and local institutions to prevent and manage conflicts; facilitate inclusive and participatory dialogue processes; build and strengthen knowledge, expertise and partnership on Conflict Prevention and democratic dialogue.

LAC COs receive technical assistance to support national and local institutions to address citizen security issues and to contribute to the improvement of the gender dimension in the citizen security in the region.
LAC COs receive technical assistance to support gender sensitive disaster risk and recovery programmes at regional, national and local levels and improve interagency coordination.

project_descr: Support to Strengthen Crisis Prevention and Recovery Capacities of UNDP Country Offices in Latin America and the Caribbean
project_title: Support to Strengthen CPR Capacities of UNDP CO LAC
